    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2928</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2928</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Com puc fer el plural sense equivocar-me?</string>
            <string language="en">How do you make nouns plural in English without making mistakes?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie bilden Sie Gegenstandswörter plural auf 
englisch, ohne Fehler zu machen?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment rendez-vous des noms pluriels en anglais 
sans faire des erreurs ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como você faz substantivos plurais em inglês sem
fazer erros?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come rendete i nomi plurali in inglese senza fare 
gli errori?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς κάνετε τον πληθυντικό ουσιαστικών στα αγγλικά 
χωρίς παραγωγή των λαθών;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) mitjançant la qual es pot consultar com es construeix el plural dels noms en anglès.
La pàgina explicita les normes generals de formació del plural i en dóna exemples.
Inclou un botó per a la impressió.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on how to make nouns plural in English. The page explains the general rules and gives examples. It includes a button for printing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ortografia</string>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
            <string language="es">ortografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf, wie man 
Gegenstandswörter plural auf englisch bildet. Die Seite 
beschreibt die allgemeinen Richtlinien und gibt Beispiele. Sie 
enthält eine Taste für den Druck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la façon dont rendre 
des noms pluriels en anglais. La page explique les règles 
générales et donne des exemples. Elle inclut un bouton pour 
l'impression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em como fazer substantivos 
plurais em inglês. A página explica as réguas gerais e dá 
exemplos. Inclui uma tecla para imprimir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) su come rendere i nomi plurali 
in inglese. La pagina spiega le regole generali e fornisce gli 
esempi. Include un tasto per stampare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στο πώς να κάνει τον 
πληθυντικό ουσιαστικών στα αγγλικά. Η σελίδα εξηγεί τους 
γενικούς κανόνες και δίνει τα παραδείγματα. Περιλαμβάνει 
ένα κουμπί για την εκτύπωση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épellation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">soletração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ortografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
